Lucky Timeout for Take-Two as Game Crunch Looms ... Skipping the current year might seem foolish for a couple of reasons. For one, videogames are definitely having a moment , given the mass shutdowns that have confined people to their homes with few other entertainment options. Take-Two's own results for the March quarter reflected this, with net bookings from its games surging 49% from a year earlier to $729.4 million. And that came mostly from ...  this year. Executives at both Activision and Electronic Arts have both admitted to challenges from the new setup, though so far neither has shifted any major release dates.
